data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Jia, Su, Yirui, Chen, Hongwei (2017): The genus Leucophenga (Diptera, Drosophilidae), part VII: the subpollinosa species group from China, with morphological and molecular evidence. Zootaxa 4247 (3): 201-245, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.3.1|82 occurrences
